General.Name: Bangsaphan Barmill Public Company Limited
General.Description: Bangsaphan Barmill Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes deformed and round steel bars for concrete building structures in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Mr. Surakit  Thantananont
1.Title: Deputy MD of Accounting & Fin. and Company Sec.

2.Name: Mr. Thavee  Jatchavala
2.Title: Exec. Deputy MD & Acting Admin. Department Mang.
